item.title: 停止生产一分钱说明了很多政策问题
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 过去四个月美国预算赤字达到创纪录的 8400 亿美元
item.description: 受医疗、社会保障、退伍军人转移支付和债务利息支付等领域支出增加的推动，美国联邦预算缺口在本财年前三分之一的时间里扩大到创纪录的8400亿美元。【原文：The US federal budget gap widened to a record $840 billion for the first third of the fiscal year, propelled by spending increases in areas including health, Social Security, transfers to veterans and debt-interest payments.】

item.title: Pemex 将与私营部门合作伙伴分享风险投资利润
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆说，墨西哥石油公司将与私营部门合作伙伴在合资企业中分享利润，合资企业的产量可能占到国有石油公司产量的 10%。【原文：Petroleos Mexicanos will split profits with private-sector partners in joint ventures that may account for as much as 10% of the state oil company’s output, said Mexico President Claudia Sheinbaum.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会放宽公司否决股东提案的途径
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）发布了新的指导方针，使公司更容易在年会上阻止对股东提案的投票。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission released new guidelines making it easier for corporations to block votes on shareholder proposals at their annual meetings.】

item.title: 加拿大银行认为关税削弱了投资和信心
item.description: 加拿大银行官员承认，潜在贸易战带来的经济不确定性支持了他们上个月的降息决定。【原文：Bank of Canada officials acknowledged the economic uncertainty created by a potential trade battle supported their decision to cut interest rates last month.】

item.title: 据说帆点首次公开募股超额认购超过 20 倍
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，SailPoint 公司正在引导潜在投资者，该公司首次公开发行股票时收到的订单量是现有股票的 20 多倍。【原文：SailPoint Inc. is guiding prospective investors that its initial public offering has received orders for more than 20 times the shares available, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 悉尼摩天大楼揭示住房问题的选举战线
item.description: 在悉尼的外郊中心帕拉马塔（Parramatta），一片杂草丛生的土地夹在火车站和韦斯特菲尔德购物中心（Westfield mall）之间，象征着围绕未来住房和谁来管理澳大利亚而形成的战线。【原文：In Sydney’s outer suburban hub of Parramatta, an overgrown patch of land sandwiched between the train station and a Westfield mall is emblematic of the battle lines forming around the future of housing and who will run Australia.】

item.title: 苹果将为安卓手机引入 TV+，以增加用户数量
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，苹果公司将宣布首次把 TV+ 流媒体视频服务扩展到 Android 手机。【原文：Apple Inc. is set to announce that it’s expanding the TV+ streaming video service to Android phones for the first time, according to people familiar with the move.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克为竞购 OpenAI 拉拢财大气粗的忠实拥趸
item.description: 即使是世界上最富有的人，在试图完成历史上最大的一次恶意收购时，也需要朋友的帮助。【原文：Even the richest person in the world needs a bit of help from his friends when trying to pull off one of the largest hostile takeovers in history.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行不应在利率接近中性时仓促降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧洲中央银行决不能急于进一步降息，尤其是在借贷成本接近既不限制也不刺激经济的水平时。【原文：The European Central Bank mustn’t rush further interest-rate cuts, especially as borrowing costs approach a level that neither restricts nor stimulates the economy, Governing Council Joachim Nagel said.】

item.description: 在各种商品和服务价格上涨的推动下，1 月份的通胀数据高于预期。【原文：Inflation data came in higher than expected in January, driven by price gains across a broad range of goods and services.】

item.title: 财政部长为何关注 10 年期收益率
item.description: 金融新闻总是充斥着各种数字，但有一个数字几乎总是比其他任何数字都重要：10 年期美国国债收益率，这是帮助全球数万亿美元资产定价的重要基准。【原文：Financial news is always awash in numbers, but there’s one figure that’s almost always more important than anything else: the yield on 10-year US Treasury notes, an important benchmark that helps price trillions of dollars in global assets.】

item.title: 关于 FATF--打击黑钱的全球工作组
item.description: 世界上充斥着肮脏的金钱，而罪犯们也在不断寻找新的方法，将他们的赃款藏匿在房地产、艺术品、证券、加密货币和老式银行账户中。各国的金融监管机构负责监管数字转账和离岸空壳公司的最新伎俩，但还有一个不起眼的国际组织正在发挥更大的影响力。【原文：The world is awash in dirty money — and criminals who are constantly finding new ways to hide their loot in real estate, art, securities, cryptocurrencies and old fashioned bank accounts. Policing the latest tricks in digital transfers and offshore shell companies falls to financial regulators in each country, but there’s also an obscure international group that’s exerting more influence.】

item.title: 英国央行格林敦促在经济供应受损的情况下谨慎降息
item.description: 英国央行政策制定者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，英国的通胀不太可能自行消退，需要在更长时间内保持高利率。【原文：Inflation in the UK is unlikely to fade of its own accord and will require interest rates to remain high for longer, according to Bank of England policymaker Megan Greene.】

item.title: 审计师确认债务差异后塞内加尔债券暴跌
item.description: 塞内加尔国家审计长证实了早些时候的一项调查结果，即西非国家的公共债务和预算赤字大大高于之前的报告，此后塞内加尔的美元债券大幅下跌。【原文：Senegal’s dollar bonds slumped after the state auditor corroborated an earlier finding that the West African nation’s public debt and budget deficit were significantly higher than previously reported.】

item.title: 鲍威尔称最新通胀数据显示美联储还有更多工作要做
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，最新的消费者价格数据显示，尽管央行在抑制通胀方面取得了实质性进展，但仍有更多工作要做。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said the latest consumer price data show that while the central bank has made substantial progress toward taming inflation, there is still more work to do.】

item.title: 甲骨文公司埃里森呼吁各国政府统一数据，为人工智能提供支持
item.description: 甲骨文公司联合创始人兼董事长拉里-埃里森（Larry Ellison）表示，各国政府应整合所有国家数据，供人工智能模型使用，并称这一步骤是各国政府充分利用人工智能技术的 "缺失环节"。【原文：Oracle Corp.’s co-founder and chairman Larry Ellison said governments should consolidate all national data for consumption by artificial intelligence models, calling this step the “missing link” for them to take full advantage of the technology.】

item.title: 欧盟贸易负责人就寻找关税解决方案与特朗普团队会谈
item.description: 欧盟贸易负责人马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普即将上任的政府的三位高层成员就如何为酝酿中的跨大西洋贸易争端找到解决方案进行了交谈。【原文：European Union trade chief Maros Sefcovic spoke with three top members of US President Donald Trump’s incoming administration on how to find a solution to the brewing transatlantic trade dispute.】

item.title: 一个月内鸡蛋价格飙升 15%，全美杂货店货架空空如也
item.description: 美国鸡蛋严重短缺的情况越来越严重。【原文：The great American egg shortage is getting worse.】

item.title: 美国拒绝推迟撤军，以色列坚持在黎巴嫩设岗
item.description: 熟悉谈判情况的人士说，以色列要求在下周的最后期限之后继续在黎巴嫩驻军，但遭到了美国的拒绝，因此以色列正力争守住在黎巴嫩的少数阵地。【原文：Israel is pushing to hold onto a handful of positions in Lebanon after a request to keep the bulk of its troops in the country beyond next week’s deadline was rejected by the US, said people familiar with negotiations.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安认为美联储维持利率的时间比市场预期的要长
item.description: 穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）表示，在一份高于预期的通胀报告公布后，美联储将在 "相当长一段时间内 "避免降息。【原文：The Federal Reserve is set to refrain from cutting interest rates for “quite a while,” following a hotter-than-expected inflation report, according to Mohamed El-Erian.】

item.title: 纳米比亚警告特朗普与南非的争执危及经济
item.description: 纳米比亚央行行长警告说，美国和南非之间不断升级的紧张局势可能会破坏纳米比亚的经济稳定，并提到了纳米比亚与这两个国家的密切关系以及与兰特挂钩的纳米比亚元的脆弱性。【原文：Namibia’s central bank chief warned that escalating tensions between the US and South Africa could destabilize its economy, citing the close ties it has with the two nations and the vulnerability of the Namibian dollar, which is pegged to the rand.】

item.title: CPPIB 三个月内至少向私募股权投资投入 50 亿美元
item.description: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会在 2024 年的最后三个月向私募股权投资投入了至少 50 亿美元，因为该资产类别重新获得了吸引力。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board poured at least $5 billion into private equity in the last three months of 2024 as the asset class regained appeal.】

item.title: 以下是美国 1 月份 CPI 报告的主要内容
item.description: 以下是周三公布的 1 月份 CPI 通胀报告的五大要点：【原文：Here are five key takeaways from the January CPI inflation report, released Wednesday:】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所在得克萨斯州开设新交易所，力争获得 IPO 业务
item.description: 纽约证券交易所（New York Stock Exchange）表示，它将在达拉斯开设一家证券交易所，而竞争对手的证券市场运营商也在重组其地区布局，以抓住新的上市机会。【原文：The New York Stock Exchange said it’s starting an equities exchange in Dallas, as rival stock market operators reorganize their regional footprint to capture new listings.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司首席执行官称，特朗普执政期间石油价格下降也能应对
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）首席执行官玛格达-尚布里亚特（Magda Chambriard）表示，在唐纳德-特朗普执政期间，巴西石油巨头可以承受全球价格略微下滑。【原文：Petrobras Chief Executive Officer Magda Chambriard said the Brazilian oil giant can withstand global prices sliding a little lower under Donald Trump.】

item.title: 普华永道称南非支出需求令债务控制计划捉襟见肘
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）的工作变得更加艰难，要求增加国防开支的呼声进一步考验着他下周提交一份审慎预算的能力。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana’s job just got harder, with calls for more defense spending further testing his ability to present a prudent budget next week.】
